data.message:
My Reactions isn't working & I've done EVERYTHING everyone has suggested. App is up to date. Have turned phone off & on & also deleted fb & added it back. 
My I Pad also doesn't have the new Reactions. A little frustrated!

replies.message: Hi Melanie. Reactions are available in select locations at this time. Please hang tight while our team rolls this out more broadly. If you'd like to have Reactions, please let us know: http://on.fb.me/1YohbZ0. -Kate
That's true both my kids have them, but I don't. Weird!

Lee Lombardo Freistat I have the Reactions today! Maybe you need to make a post directly to the Facebook page, like so many has done, but mine are finally working & I didn't do anything, they just showed up!
I'm seeing this happen more and more but I still don't have them since I guess I haven't specifically complain to them, I'll just wait it out I guess
I did make a comment to FB on this site & they appeared the next day.
